flixel.addons.editors.tiled.TiledObject

type
class
Last modified 10/3/2013 by Samuel Batista (original by Matt Tuttle based on Thomas Jahn's. Haxe port by Adrien Fischer) This content is released under the MIT License.

Static Variables

ELLIPSE(inline,null) : Int

FLIPPED_HORIZONTALLY_FLAG(inline,null) : Int

FLIPPED_VERTICALLY_FLAG(inline,null) : Int

Use these to determine whether a sprite should be flipped, for example: var flipped:Bool = cast (oject.gid & TiledObject.FLIPPED_HORIZONTALLY_FLAG); sprite.facing = flipped ? FlxObject.LEFT : FlxObject.RIGHT;

POLYGON(inline,null) : Int

POLYLINE(inline,null) : Int

RECTANGLE(inline,null) : Int

TILE(inline,null) : Int

Constructor

new(Source : haxe.xml.Fast, Parent : TiledObjectGroup)

Instance Variables

angle : Float

In degrees

custom : TiledPropertySet

Custom properties that users can set on this object

flippedHorizontally(accessor,null) : Bool

Whether the object is flipped horizontally.

flippedVertically(accessor,null) : Bool

Whether the object is flipped vertically.

gid : Int

Global identifier for this object

group : TiledObjectGroup

Information on the group or "Layer" that contains this object

height : Int

name : String

objectType(default,null) : Int

The type of the object (RECTANGLE, ELLIPSE, POLYGON, POLYLINE, TILE)

points : Array<flixel.util.FlxPoint>

An array with points if the object is a POLYGON or POLYLINE

shared : TiledPropertySet

Shared properties are tileset properties added on object tile

type : String

width : Int

x : Int

xmlData : haxe.xml.Fast

y : Int

Instance Methods

get_flippedHorizontally() : Bool

Property accessors

get_flippedVertically() : Bool
